ygData.subject: Re: [ANN] Heritrix 1.12.0
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi St.Ack, I added both order.xml and seeds.txt - and also some detailed observation of the issue. Hope it helps you tracking down the cause... Please note,

Hi St.Ack,

I added both order.xml and seeds.txt - and also some detailed
o=
bservation of the issue. Hope it helps you tracking down the cause...

Plea=
se note, that I'm not experiencing this issue when using ARCWriter
- so the=
 cause seems to lie somewhere in the WARC writer(s)...

Regards
  Olaf Frey=
er

or
